text: Arthrosaura synaptolepis is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found on granite mountains in tropical forests in Venezuela and Brazil. It is also known as Donneisy's Arthrosaura. ==References== Category:Arthrosaura Category:Reptiles described in 1992 Category:Taxa named by Maureen Ann Donnelly Category:Taxa named by Roy Wallace McDiarmid Category:Taxa named by Charles W. Myers
title: Arthrosaura synaptolepis
